# revealDocument(at:importIfNeeded:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Reveals, and optionally imports, the document at the provided URL.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func revealDocument(at url: URL, importIfNeeded: Bool, completion: ((URL?, (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
@MainActor func revealDocument(at url: URL, importIfNeeded: Bool) async throws -> URL
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL of the document to reveal.
- **importIfNeeded**: A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser should import the document.
- **completion**: A completion block with the following parameters:



## Discussion

Call this method to display a document in the document browser.

If `importIfNeeded` is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the document browser calls its delegate’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate/documentBrowser(_:didImportDocumentAt:toDestinationURL:)] method (or its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate/documentBrowser(_:failedToImportDocumentAt:error:)] method, if an error occurred) before calling the completion handler.

## Configuring a document browser

- **allowsDocumentCreation**: A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser can create new documents.
- **allowsPickingMultipleItems**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select and open more than one document at a time.
- **contentTypesForRecentDocuments**: Content types for browsing recent documents.
